title: Roma 0-2 Atalanta: Chris Smalling tastes defeat on debut
text:
Chris Smalling has tasted defeat on his Roma debut as Atalanta walked away with all three points at the Stadio Olimpico on Wednesday night.

Edin Dzeko had the first real chance of the game after the Bosnian created space before firing a shot at goal but Pierluigi Gollini was on hand to make a superb stop.

Minutes later, the visitors came close to scoring with a chance of their own but Josip Ilicic's half-volley flashed just wide of the near post with the score remaining goalless at the interval.

Marten de Roon heads in a second goal for Atalanta to wrap up all three points on Wednesday

De Roon is congratulated by his team-mates as he doubles Atalanta's lead in the 90th minute

Duvan Zapata (left) comes off the bench to rifle home the first goal for Atalanta

The Atalanta striker celebrates with his team-mates after breaking the deadlock

Chris Smalling got his loan spell at Roma off to a disappointing start as he tasted defeat

MATCH FACTS ROMA: (4-2-3-1) Lopez; Spinazzola (Jesus 56), Smalling, Fazio (Kalinic 76), Kolarov; Cristante, Veretout; Zaniolo (Mkhitaryan 65), Pellegrini, Florenzi; Dzeko SUBS NOT USED: Fuzato (GK), Mirante (GK); Antonucci, Diawara, Kluviert, Pastore, Santon GOALS: None BOOKINGS: Zaniolo (40), Jesus (89) COACH: Paulo Fonseca ATALANTA: (3-4-1-2) Gollini; Toloi, Kjaer, Palomino; Hateboer, de Roon, Freuler, Castagne; Malinovsky (Gosens 79); Ilicic (Zapata 60), Gomez SUBS NOT USED: Rossi (GK), Sportiello (GK); Arana, Barrow, Djimsiti, Ibanez, Masiello, Pasalic GOALS: Zapata (71), de Roon (90) BOOKINGS: Kjaer (25) COACH: Gian Piero Gasperini REFEREE: Massimiliano Irrati VENUE: Stadio Olimpico

Nicolo Zaniolo had a glorious chance to break the deadlock in the second half but took too long to get his shot away after rounding the goalkeeper inside the area.

Atalanta then squandered the best chance of the game when Jose Palomino put wide with a header but the centre-back's blushes were spared when Duvan Zapata rifled in the opener just moments later.

Roma then had another brilliant opportunity to score denied after Nikola Kalinic's shot was superbly blocked in a last-ditch effort. Zapata was denied his brace with four minutes of normal time left when his shot struck the outside of the post.

Marten de Roon then doubled the lead in the 90th minute to wrap up all three points as he headed in a second.

Nicolo Zaniolo skips past the challenge of Palomino before going on through to shoot at goal

However, the promising Italian squandered the chance after he did well to round the keeper

Smalling, who is on loan from Manchester United, tracks his man during the first half
description: Chris Smalling has tasted defeat on his Roma debut  as Atalanta walked away with all three points at the Stadio Olimpico on Wednesday night.
